H0.text: iupac name of element with atomic number 107. Unnilseptium

H1.text: iupac name of element with atomic number 107. Nielsium

H2.text: iupac name of element with atomic number 107. Seaborgiumium

H3.text: iupac name of element with atomic number 107. bohrium

A4.text: In 1994 a committee of IUPAC recommended that element 107 be named bohrium

A5.text: the name bohrium for element 107 was recognized internationally in 1997
